ai-thag5.2:1.3_0: If while wandering you find no partner
ai-thag5.2:1.4_0: they say: “That’s a sign of my bad luck.”
ai-thag5.2:2.1_0: When a misfortune is extracted and beaten,
ai-thag5.2:2.2_0: to surrender it in part would be like losing at dice;
ai-thag5.2:2.3_0: but to surrender it all you’d have to be blind,
ai-thag5.2:2.4_0: not seeing the even and the uneven.
ai-thag5.2:3.1_0: You should only say what you would do;
ai-thag5.2:3.2_0: you shouldn’t say what you wouldn’t do.
ai-thag5.2:5.4_0: for one who acts on it.
